content: wrap your little one in warmth and love with the willow baby blanket pattern this easy-to-follow crochet pattern features a beautifully textured design that s both modern and timeless perfect for gifts nurseries or cherished keepsakes whether you re a beginner or an experienced crocheter the step-by-step instructions make it simple enough for anyone to make details - pattern is written in standard us terms - basic knowledge of beginner stitches is needed to make this pattern - size of baby blanket is 30 inches x 30 inches note - instructions are give on how to modify the size of this blanket to make a different size - guided video tutorial is provided for this pattern supplies needed - 4 skeins of hobby lobby s yarn bee bamboo-tiful in the color linen weight 3/ 4oz 257yds a total of 1 028 yards or you can use another lightweight category number 3 yarn example lion brand coboo yarn - size 4 0 mm g crochet hook - darning needle - scissors
